title: Football participation England 2016 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of participants, containing a total of 4 data points.
Overall Number of participants has decreased over the Year.
Number of participants is roughly constant from 2016 to 2017, gradually decreasing from 2017 to 2018, and finally roughly constant from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Number of participants, about 2299700.0 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Number of participants about 2056900.0 was reached at Year 2019
